about_the_game:
Hyper Tanks is an action-packed arena shooter with futuristic Tanks! Pick one of various Tank classes, embark on challenging Singleplayer campaigns and beat up your friends in fun Multiplayer modes! Dodge incoming fire, make your shots bounce around corners and deploy Special Weapons to dominate your enemies!



Control your Tank from the tactical top-down perspective, or immerse yourself in the action with the 3rd person perspective. The cool part: You can switch between both perspectives at any time with the press of a button. The Tank controls automatically adjust to the current view mode. [in matches with multiple human players the game can only be played in top-down perspective]



Destroy hordes of enemies in epic Campaigns, either as Single Player or in Co-op! Don't lose all lives or your campaign run starts over again!

  • Variety: No run will be the same as you choose your own path through a randomized mission tree. Missions will have different objectives, level layouts and enemies.
  • Customization: Choose a unique Tank with distinct traits and Abilities at the start of each run. Upgrade your Tank on your way through the Campaign to increase your odds.
  • Tactics: Sneak up on enemies from behind, bounce your shots around corners or use Powerups and Special Weapons to gain the upper hand.
  • Boss Battles: Each campaign ends with an epic Boss fight that will test your skills!



Beat up your friends or CPU players in action packed Multiplayer Modes for up to 4 players!

  • Many modes: Play different modes with unique rules and objectives, including classics like Deathmatch or Capture the Flag! Some modes can be played both as Free For All and as Team Battle.
  • Online & Offline: Battle your friends in local couch multiplayer, or invite your online Steam friends to join you via Steam Remote Play! Your friends do not even need to own the game to join the fun. [other players need a Controller to play]
  • CPU players: All modes can be played with or against capable CPU players. You can control their difficulty settings and even give commands to your CPU allies!



Pick the Tank that suits your playstyle or master them all!

  • Unique traits: Every Tank has unique stats, traits, movement methods and weaponry. They all feel different to play.
  • Unique Abilities: All Tanks have unique inherent Abilities, from a Charged Shot over a Defense Drone to a short-range Teleport. Use them in key moments to surprise your foes!



Choose one of many different Special Weapons to customize your Tank!

  • Ultimate: Treat your Special Weapon like an Ultimate Ability. It has a long cooldown, but can dramatically change the outcome of battles.
  • Variety: There are many Special Weapons to choose from, such as a Defense Turret, a Fireball, an EMP or a Tornado, and more. Oh, and of course there is a Grappling Hook, because every game needs one.

name: Hyper Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD with 2.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD with 3Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Choose your Tank and fight in retro-futuristic Arenas! Destroy hordes of enemies in a challenging roguelike Campaign, or beat your friends and AI players in action-packed Multiplayer modes! Utilize Powerups, Special Weapons, and Tank Abilities to survive the mayhem of Hyper Tanks!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
